title: Orb card
data:
{{Version028}} {{flavour|The card depicts a figure surrounded by floating, glowing orbs of energy.}} The Orb card conjures balls of destructive magic - more specifically, [[Orb of destruction|Orbs of Destruction]]. The amount varies by your [[invocation]]s; at high power, multiple orbs will encircle the player. ==History== This card used to activate various [[Conjurations]], and only at high power did it spawn OODs.
